channel.title: Having problem with compiler and run. [508]
channel.description:
it says
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
for both my run and compiler for my 508.
in my run it says
[code]@echo off Title Berky-Scape cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_5\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 PAUSE [/code]
and jdk1.6.0_5 is my right java.
now to my compiler.
[code]@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_5\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause[/code]
and it dont work. please help.

item.title: Having problem with compiler and run. [508]
item.dc:creator: @catmandanny1 catmandanny1
item.description:
@catmandanny1 wrote:

hey, U NEED LATEST VERSION OF JAVA. TRUST ME, I AM EXPERIENCED IN CODEING.

GET JDK1.6.0_12 OR JDK1.6.0_11 I HAVE 12

Read full topic
